8/15/22, tested should be 1/2:
"Resumes must be identified automatically based on similarities to other resumes received in the past." - Trainable classifier can handle this
"Employment applications and resumes must be deleted automatically two years after the applications are received." - 1 retention label set to two yr retention + 1 auto label policy pointing to the trainer
"Documents and emails that contain an application serial number must be identified automatically and marked as an employment application." - 1 auto labeling policy can satisfy this condition. (also need a sensitive information type but not needed for this question)

The employment application form is downloaded from SharePoint Online and a serial number is assigned to each application.
The resumes are written by the applicants and are in any format.

Based off this you cannot use the same auto-label policy for both doc types, so you would need to choose 2 auto-label policies so one can "Apply label to content that contains words or phrases..." and another policy to "Apply label to content that matches trainable classifier", which there is a built-in "Resume" classifier for.
